about_the_game:
Dungeon Spheres is a strategy game where you must eliminate all enemy spheres in each level until none remain. To achieve this, you will randomly summon different classes of spheres, both allied and enemy.

Each game is unique since you will never know exactly which spheres will appear. This will force you to adapt, try different combinations, and discover the best strategies for each situation. Some spheres complement each other, enhancing their effectiveness, while others may generate unexpected effects that change the course of the battle.

Learn to take advantage of the synergies between spheres to overcome all the replayable levels the game offers. Experiment with different tactics, test new combinations, and find the best way to defeat your opponents.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent

short_description: You are the lord of spheres. You must protect your castle from enemy spheres by correctly summoning those at your disposal. But be careful, not all of your spheres will be your allies. Use the synergies between them to achieve victory.
